summary: Azalea - She was abandoned by her mother with her eyes still open and her umbilical cord still attached, left on cold concrete, and was then rescued. Her sibling, who was rescued alongside her, died soon after, but she grew up healthily thanks to the loving and dedicated care of her foster mother. She joined our family in July 2010. Her birthday is May 13th. She is 14 years old. She is a proud tsundere queen.
